scripts.build-server: rm -rf dist && babel src --ignore node_modules --copy-files --out-dir dist
scripts.copy-client: rm -rf dist/client && mkdir dist/client && cp -R client/build/ dist/client/build
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm i && npm run build && cd .. && npm run copy-client
scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-client
scripts.docker-prep: npm run docker-stop && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-start
scripts.start-docker: npm run docker-prep && docker logs server_iron-iot-lamp_1 -f
scripts.deploy-tail-logs: npm run deploy && gcloud app logs tail -s default
